Вітаю, падарожнік. Вы гуляеце ў {GAME_NAME}? Я лічуся майстрам у гэтай гульні, традыцыйнай забавы гаспадарства {CULTURE_NAME}. Калі зацікаўлены ў гульні, прысаджвайцеся, і мы пачнём.
Я буду белым.
Мы чакаем ад вас добрых навінаў, {?PLAYER.GENDER}пані{?}панове{\?}.
Слухайце мяне. Ці праводзіў нехта з удзельнікаў турніру доўгія гадзіны на кірмашы і ў карчме? Больш, чым звычайна?
Выбачай. Калі ніхто не перарэжа табе горла, магчыма, мы сустрэнемся зноў.
Мяне клічуць {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}, тутэйшы гандляр з {SETTLEMENT_STRING}. {BUSINESS_STRING}
Вы сустракаліся з чалавекам, які забраў маю рэч? Вы яе вярнулі?
Дзякуй, {?PLAYER.GENDER}мая спадарыня{?}мой спадар{\?}. Калі вашыя людзі змогуць знайсці маю дзяўчынку і вярнуць яе мне, я буду вельмі ўдзячны. Я заплачу вам {BASE_REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} за клопаты.
Гучыць нядрэнна. Я хачу паступіць да вас на службу ў якасці найміта.
Вам удалося знайсці шпіёна, але вы прайгралі дуэль. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}расчаравана{?}расчараваны{\?}.
Як пажадаеце. Дай мне ведаць, калі раздумаеце.
Гэта было пацешна, але я навучыўся не прычыняць занадта моцнага зневажэння тым, хто носіць меч. Я забяру сваю перамогу і зараз буду цешыцца ім. Да сустрэчы!
Чыя гэта майстэрня?
Як пажадаеце. Вашыя ворагі - мае ворагі.
Вы чулі мяне. Здавайцеся або ваюйце!
Дазвольце мне падумаць пра гэтае.
...і бараніць вашыя правы па законах Стургіі, і правы вашых сваякоў, і помсціць за іх кроў, як за ўласную.
Вы ачысцілі ад чальцоў банды тэрыторыю, на якую яны прэтэндавалі. Жадаеце застацца тут, каб пераканацца, што іншыя не паспрабуюць забраць яе назад?
Давайце правядзём дыягностыку вашай фракцыі.
Паспрабуйце забыцца пра ўсё гэтае і вярнуцца ў дом свайго бацькі.
Дайце мне ключы ад клетак. Зараз жа!
Так, сябра. Мы ведаем, што ў цябе праблемы. Нам сказалі наглядаць за табою....
Цяпер я працую на {EMPLOYER}.
Гэта была вясёлая гульня. Дзякуй.
магчыма, вы страцілі нешта каштоўнае. Прыходзьце да нас, і, мажліва, мы дапаможам знайсці гэтае. Натуральна, за пэўную плату.
А як жа мае абавязкі найміта?

Разбойнік перамог вас. Ён і {TARGET_HERO.LINK} уцяклі, пакуль вы былі без прытомнасці. Вы не змаглі вярнуць дачку яе {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}матцы{?}бацьку{\?}, як абяцалі {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}Яна ў{?}Ён у{\?} лютасці.
Так, я буду граць на самым складаным узроўні.
Калі ласка, {?PLAYER.GENDER}спадарыня{?}спадар{\?}. Я шчыра кахаю яго і жадаю правесці з ім усё сваё жыццё. Я прашу вас, калі ласка, не стойце на нашым шляху.
Добра, добра. Гэта лепшы спосаб вырашыць такія рэчы. Ідзіце ў {TARGET_SETTLEMENT}, знайдзіце гэтага арганізатара гульні і сатрыце ўхмылку з яго твару..
Зразумела не, {LORD_SALUTATION}. Я заўсёды буду вашым адданым васалам.
Я буду чорным.
Прабачце. Прагрэсу пакуль няма.
Так, вы прынеслі {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}? Гэта тое, што ён вінен... Зразумела, з нашай зацікаўленасцю.
Так, {LORD_SALUTATION}.
Праўда? Ну, я лічу, што вы проста не суладаеце з гэтым заданнем. Мне прыйдзецца пашукаць некага адважнейшага.
Вось грошы, зараз жа вызваліце яго!
Прыемна гэтае чуць.
Так... Чаму б і не? У мяне цяпер няма нічога занадта тэрміновага.
Я гатовы прадаць. Але гэта будзе каштаваць вам {COST} {GOLD_ICON}. Вы гатовыя плаціць?
Заставайся ў бяспецы, мая дарагая.

Прыйшлі пазмагацца са мной, так? Гэта {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} падгаварыў вас? Паслухайце, няма патрэбы ў кровапраліцці. Гэты досыць вялікі горад для ўсіх нас. Але... калі вы жадаеце кровапраліцця, я з радасцю яго забяспечу.
АБЯРЫЦЕ СПАДЧЫННІКА
Беражыце сябе, {PLAYER.NAME}. Спадзяюся ўбачыць вас ізноў хуткім часам.
Маё імя {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}. Даведайцеся пра мяне. Вам скажуць, што я падтрымліваю мір у завулках.[ib:warrior]
Дзверы зачынены!
Нават калі няма турніру, усё адно варта зайсці. Многія байцы бавяць тут час, трэнеруючыся, каб падтрымліваць сябе ў форме, і мы ўзнагароджваем пераможцаў парай манет за іх клопаты.

Я абвяшчаю вас грамадзянінам Імперыі ў рангу сенатара. Вашая жыццё і маёмасць будуць ахоўвацца нашымі законамі і не могуць быць адняты ў вас інакш як па законе. Вы можаце служыць у якасці магістрата над гарадамі і вёскамі і ў якасці генерала над войскамі, калі мы заклічам вас да гэтага.
Вітаю, сябар. Ты тут для ўдзелу ў турніры.
Супакойся! Твой бацька паслаў мяне знайсці цябе.
Я жадаю вярнуцца да таго, што вы згадвалі раней...
Нічога.

Хай будзе вядома, што вы прыняты ў канфедэрацыю хузаітаў і будзеце лічыцца родам з 12 сыноў ваўчыцы. Вы можаце засядаць у нашых вайсковых і мірных радах. Мы будзем бараніць вашыя статкі і помсціць за вашую кроў, калі вы падзёце. Вашыя статкі могуць пасвіцца на нашых землях і піць з нашых крыніцаў.
продкі

{COMPANION.LINK} і людзі, якіх вы паслалі з {?COMPANION.GENDER}ёй{?}ім{\?} бяспечна вяртаюцца з весткай пра поспех. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}шчаслівая{?}шчаслівы{\?} і пасылае вам свае падзякі з {REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} грашыма, якія {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}яна абяцала{?}ён абяцаў{\?}.
Тады вядзіце.

Усё не так. Ён з беднай сям'і, з тых, хто заўсёды ўцягнены ў нейкую схему махлярства з зямлёй ці заўважаны ў сувязях з вядомымі бандытамі. У кожнай вёсцы ёсць такія чорныя авечкі, але я ніколі не думаў, што ён учэпіцца ў маю дачку!
Баюся, мае фінансы не дазволяць зрабіць такі падарунак.
Я чуў, што ў лесе праходзілі таемныя сустрэчы. Урачыстыя клятвы, падпісаныя крывёю. Хутка падзьме моцны вецер. Памяніце мае словы.
Вы маеце рацыю. Вы вольныя чыніць правасуддзе так, як лічыце патрэбным.
Файна, мая каханая. Спадзяюся, мы хутка вызначымся з умовамі нашага шлюбу.
Хмм. Гэта магчыма. Які?
Я ўсё яшчэ працую над гэтым.
Вы можаце пачаць.
Тут праходзіць турнір?
Лёгка
Так, {PLAYER_SALUTATION}. Дазвольце мне ўладзіць свае справы тут, у {SETTLEMENT}, і я хутка буду з вамі.
Мы будзем ваяваць да апошняй кроплі крыві!
Алек, Алек змагаўся з мядзведзем. Асіліў яго, сумленна і справядліва.{newline}Не з мячом і не з дзідай. А дыханнем часнаку і піва.
Вы замаскаваны.
Выбачце, мой меч не для найму.

Ён мае рацыю! Я збегла з ім добраахвотна. Я люблю {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}маю маці{?}майго бацьку{\?}, але {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}яна{?}ён{\?} можа быць такім тыранам. Калі ласка {?PLAYER.GENDER}пані{?}панаве{\?}, калі вы верыце ў волю і каханне, калі ласка, пакіньце нас у спакоі.
Жэрабя гэтаксама вызначае, якую зброю вы атрымаеце. Пераможцы кожнага матча праходзяць у наступны раўнд. Калі застаюцца толькі двое, яны ваююць адзін з адным за званне чэмпіёна.
Лепей не спяваць гэта кожнаму сустрэчнаму незнаёмаму, дзіцё.
{?PLAYER.GENDER}Мая шляхцянка{?}Мой шляхціч{\?}, мага вас на пару словаў?
Вы добры сябар. Вельмі добры.[if:convo_focused_happy]
Я - {PLAYER.NAME}. А хто вы?
Тут нельга губляць пільнасць. Зашмат вырадкаў задумваюць ліхое.
У большасці людзей хутчэй ёсць валасы, чым не, але гэта яшчэ адна частка ў мазаіцы.

Мы будзем бясконца ўдзячныя, калі вы зможаце дапамагчы майму сваяку. Застаецца дадаць, што я гатовы заплаціць вам {REWARD_GOLD} дэнароў за вашыя клопаты. Ён хаваецца недзе тут, пагаварыце з ім і скажыце, што ён зараз у бяспецы.
Раўнд скончаны, вы выжылі ў апошнім раўндзе турніру.
Наогул, няважна.
Нябёсы абароняць мяне![ib:aggressive][if:convo_astonished]
Я чуў, {ENEMY_NAME} здзяйсняюць набегі на мяжу... Наваколлем лепей прачнуцца.
Вы зрабілі мне добрую паслугу. Спадзяюся, я змагу адплаціць вам.[if:convo_focused_happy]
Я пайду адразу
Абярыце спадчынніка
Гэта справядліва. Далучайцеся да нас
Нашае гаспадарства не ваюе зараз, {PLAYER.NAME}. Нам не патрэбны найміты.
Я ведаў, што ўрэшце мы знойдзем цябе. Зараз ты паўстанеш перад правасуддзем!
Бах... Перамовы скончаны.[if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]
{ALLEY_ACTIVITY_STRING} {ALLEY_ACTIVITY_ADDITION}
Баюся, я не змагу выканаць гэты квэст.
Вы гатовыя да бою?
Добра, я магу дапамагчы чымсьці яшчэ?
Вы ж ваяр, так? Гульні - выдатны спосаб зрабіць сабе імя. Каб прыцягнуць таленты, мясцовыя гандляры збіраюць для пераможца тлусты гаманец.

У мяне няма паўнамоцтваў складаць мірную дамову ад імя {ENEMY_INFORMAL_NAME}. {ENEMY_RULER.NAME} і {?ENEMY_RULER.GENDER}яе{?}яго{\?} рада павінны вырашыць, ці трэба прапанаўваць мір, і якія будуць яго ўмовы.
Вельмі добра, прыміце гэтыя {BRIBE_MONEY}{GOLD_ICON} у знак маёй падзякі.
Ой, прабачце, {?PLAYER.GENDER}шляце{?}шляце{\?}. Магу я быць карысны?
Чума забрала маіх бацькоў, а мой дзядзька забраў іх зямлю. Але я лепей буду прасіць міласць, чым стану слугою у хаце багацея!
Вы дасведчаны гулец. Я прыму гэта да ўвагі.
Дык вось, ух, тут ёсць маладая жанчына. Мне сапраўды трэба пакінуць ёй трохі грошаў, перш чым я кудысьці з'еду. Прыкладна {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}, вы зможаце мне гэта заплаціць?
Ці сапраўды вы, {PLAYER.NAME}? Тады ідзіце і спатыкніцеся аб свой меч. Дайце нам усім мір.
Так добра. Я думаў, ты тут бос.
Я тут дзеля хлопчыка. {PRODIGAL_SON.LINK}. Вы ведаеце, аб кім я гавару.
З задавальненнем.
Ці магу я ўтрымаць усе ўзятыя замкі?
Так?
Гэта {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}пані паслала{?}пан паслаў{\?} {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} вас выратаваць мяне?
Крэўныя грошы дарэчныя ў выпадку злачынства на глебе страсці. Але калі вы спакойна заб'еце гэтага хлопчыка, вы станеце сапраўдным забойцам у вачах закона і, без сумневу, памроце.
Я хачу, каб вы адправіліся здабываць ежу.
Што цяпер?
Вы не прывялі {DAUGHTER.LINK} да {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}Яна ў{?}Ён у{\?} лютасці.
Так.
Вы камандуеце сынамі Эсера ў вайне і кіруеце імі ў свеце...
Што іменна вы жадаеце ад мяне?
Я вазьму яшчэ адну, каб сагрэцца па дарозе дадому.
Што яшчэ я магу патлумачыць?
Проста рады, што сёлета ў маіх дамачадцаў поўныя жываты. На жаль, не магу так гаварыць кожны год.
У мяне ёсць толькі хвілінка, {?PLAYER.GENDER}спадарыня{?}спадар{\?}. Мне трэба правяраць партыю, якая варыцца. Чым я магу вам дапамагчы?
Я чуў, вам можа спатрэбіцца дапамога ў вырашэнні адной праблемы?
Нябёсы адказваюць дабрынёй на дабрыню, {?PLAYER.GENDER}мая пані{?}мой панове{\?}.

Вы знепрытомелі, калі баранілі {CULPRIT.LINK}. {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} {?TARGET_NOTABLE.GENDER}адпомсціла{?}адпомсціў{\?}. Вы не змаглі абараніць {CULPRIT.LINK}, як абяцалі {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}Яна ў{?}Ён у{\?} лютасці.
Я раздумаў. Вы можаце ісці вольна.
Цяпер вашы клан ваюе з {?PLAYER.GENDER}шляхцянкай{?}шляхцічам{\?} {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. Вашая ўгода з {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} была скасавана.
Дзякуй, {PLAYER.NAME}. Я ўпэўнены, што вашы суразмоўца будзе пераканаўчым.
Вы паспяхова абаранілі {CULPRIT.LINK} ад шкоды, як і абяцалі. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} удзячны за вашую службу і шле вам прывітанне з гаманцом, поўным {REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} дэнароў за вашыя клопаты.
Было прыемна пазнаёміцца з вамі. У добры час.
Я гэтак і зраблю.
Так... Тады працягвайце.
Спадзяюся, вы не супраць усяго гэтага пілавіння вакол, {?PLAYER.GENDER}шляхце{?}шляхце{\?}. Чым я магу вам дапамагчы?
Я пайду ў карчму і вярну яго гэтак жа, як вы яго страцілі.
(Цяпер не прызначана)
Я ведаю, што часы цяжкія, але {NOTABLE.LINK} кажа, што {?OWNER.GENDER}шляхцянка{?}шляхціч{\?} {OWNER.LINK} робіць усё, што можа, а я давяраю {NOTABLE.FIRSTNAME}.
Ах, мае выбачэнні, {?PLAYER.GENDER}спадарыня{?}спадар{\?}. Магу я вам нечым дапамагчы?
Калі-небудзь вы зразумееце, што я зрабіў вам паслугу. Збірайцеся, вам пара ісці.
Сапраўды. Вы пралівалі сваю кроў за мяне, і вы заслужылі свой уласны феод...
Now, it grieves us to do this, but we have mouths to feed and we're going to have ask you to pay for passage through our lands. If you refuse, we'll have no choice but to take your money by force.
Don't worry I'll free him.
{ISSUE_GIVER.NAME} wants {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} daughter found
Hot around here, eh {?PLAYER.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}? I need to get back to the forges in a minute, but how can I help you?
Help! Help! Prison break!

Certainly! The arena is open to anyone who doesn't mind hard knocks. Looks like a few of our lads are warming up now. You can go and hop in if you want to. Or come back later when there's a tournament.[ib:warrior]

I'll tell anyone who asks: {NOTABLE.LINK} is a righteous {?NOTABLE.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?}, and speaks for the poor folk. The lords of this land must listen to {?NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}him{\?}, or misfortune will fall upon us.
Indeed.... Did you offer vassalage, then, just to buy time? Very well -- you shall have time to reconsider, but if you are toying with me, it will do your reputation no credit.
Be my guest.
Yes, brother.[ib:demure]
Your clan does not have enough influence to get them to do this!
Your Clan Tier needs to be {TIER}

Your clan is now owner of the settlement. As the {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} of the settlement you cannot get involved in gang wars anymore. Your agreement with the {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has canceled.
You're not going anywhere, friend. You're my prisoner now.
You owe me one.
I am a brother in our order.
I have more important business to do.
Aye, I'll join the {FACTION_NAME}.

I can offer you a contract for three months. At the end of those three, it can be extended month by month. An initial sum of {OFFER_VALUE}{GOLD_ICON} will be paid to you to seal the contract. After that, you'll receive wages from {FACTION_LEADER} each week, according to the number and quality of the soldiers in your company. You still have your rights to battlefield loot and salvage, as well as any prisoners you capture. War can be very profitable at times...
{NOTABLE.LINK} says that a fish rots from the head. Well, look around this place. I think we know what he's getting at.
Round is over, you are disqualified from the tournament.

It's a deed to a plot of farmland. Not a big or valuable plot, mind you, but I'd rather not have to explain to my men why they won't be sowing it this year. You can find the man who took it from me at the tavern in {TARGET_SETTLEMENT}. They call him the "Game Host". Just be straight about what you're doing. He's in no position to work the land. I don't imagine that he'll turn down a chance to make more money off of it.
I'll fight the other gang with you myself.
Very well. Let me think on this a bit longer
Our realms should make peace.
Don't worry, either I or one of my companions should be able to find her and see what's going on.
I won't take you prisoner today.
As you wish..

Perfect. Of course you shall have to make a formal declaration of allegiance, and give your oath that you and your company will remain in service to {FACTION_NAME} for a period of no less than three months.
Very well. You have given me your solemn oath, {PLAYER.NAME}. May you uphold it always, with proper courage and devotion.
Let me know how much of a challenge you can stand and we'll get started. I'm ready to offer you a {DIFFICULTY} challenge and {?IS_BETTING}a bet of {BET_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}.{?}friendly game.{\?}
Do you want to load the saved game with different modules?
We will not sign a peace until we are recognized by all the kingdoms of Calradia.
{?CONVERSATION_NPC.GENDER}My lady{?}Sir{\?}, may I ask for some time to think about this?
The pittance they call a wage these days... I don't want to leave my kin, but I'm thinking I might have to try my luck in some other town.

This is how it goes, friend. This is our turf. We answer to {ALLEY_BOSS.NAME}, and {?ALLEY_BOSS.GENDER}she's{?}he's{\?} like the {?ALLEY_BOSS.GENDER}queen{?}king{\?} here. So if you haven't got a good reason to be here, clear out.
Hmf... Very well. I shall wipe out this insult with your blood.
They say {NOTABLE.LINK} turned one of {?NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} artisans at the {.%}{SHOP_TYPE}{.%} out on the street for not showing up to work at first light. Hard times, these.
I'm getting this together as quickly as I can.
I hope {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} can work out that trouble with {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} kinsman.
Yes, I'm here to take you back.
Let us speak again soon, {PLAYER.NAME}.
My {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}, it would be an honor if you were to choose the name of my noble house.
Look, it was a good try, but they're not going to pay. Releasing the kid is the only move that makes sense.
Very well. But the world being as it is, I'm going to need {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} as a down payment on my services. Can you pay that?
I want to join your army.
There is something I'd like to discuss.
I have a proposal that may spare us both unnecessary bloodshed.
Stay your hand! Perhaps we don't have to come to blows.
You can stop following me now. Thanks.

During the games, all the best fighters from the area form teams and pummel each other. Not quite as much fun for the crowd as watching gladiators spill their guts out, of course, but healthier for the participants.[if:convo_approving]
Get away you vile beggar! You are scaring away my customers!
Very well, then. What is it?
Hope you don't mind the smoke around here, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}. Got to keep the kilns hot. How can I help you?
I wish to buy one of your workshops.
Perhaps {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} made those plans because {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} loves you.
Yes. Take these troops with you.
I would like to end my contract with the {FACTION_NAME}.
On second thought, let's keep this match friendly.
Furthermore, I accept induction into the army of Calradia, at the rank of archon.
You failed to protect {CULPRIT.LINK} as you promised {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is furious.
Thank you, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}sir{\?}, for protecting me. I will go and tell {ISSUE_GIVER.LINK} what you did for me.
Why not? I'm not going anywhere right now, and I could use another drink.
What's that?
Yes? Do you have something to say?
You can count on me. As of now, your enemies are my enemies and your honor is my honor.
So... Does this please you, {?PLAYER.GENDER}my lady{?}my lord{\?}?

Thank you my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}. I am sure your men will protect the boy and {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} will have nothing to do but to accept the blood money. I have to add, I'm ready to pay you {REWARD_GOLD} gold for your trouble.

Your companions report that the {ISSUE_GIVER.LINK}'s daughter returns to {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} safe and sound. {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} is happy and sends {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} regards with a large pouch of {BASE_REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON}.
{?PLAYER.GENDER}Madam{?}Sir{\?}, we are still waiting for your men to bring my daughter back. I pray for their success.
Can I change the difficulty?
I want you to recruit some troops.
Never mind.
Very good. I'm sure you'll chose competent men to bring our boy back.
{SALUTATION_BY_PLAYER}, I would pledge allegiance to you and be counted among your loyal followers.
The tax on this, the tax on that... Now just what do we think our beloved {?OWNER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} {OWNER.LINK} does with it all?

What have we here? I heard you thrashed some of my lads. So you're tougher than you look, but I'll have you know that's just the first arrow in my quiver. Leave now and I let you live. Stay, and I'll give you a fight you won't walk away from.

My family is concerned for the boy's life. He has gone hiding around the village commons. We need someone who can protect him until {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} accepts the blood money and ends the feud. We would be eternally grateful, if you can help my relative and take him with you for a while maybe.
Sure. Follow me.
Every day... More people in the markets... More people at the well... Where do they all come from?

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} told you that he lost a land deed in a wager in {TARGET_CITY}. He needs to buy it back, and he wants your companions to intimidate the seller into offering a reasonable price. You asked {COMPANION.LINK} to take {TROOP_COUNT} of your men to go and take care of it. They should report back to you in {RETURN_DAYS} days.
I don't want any trouble. Later.
If it will not please you, then I'll try something else.
And how would you serve us?
Round is over, your team is disqualified from the tournament.
I hate you! You killed him! I can't believe it!. I will hate you with all my heart till my dying days.[if:convo_angry]
I do not care to talk about my past.

A couple of powerful wolves against a flock of helpless sheep. {GAME_NAME} is a game of uneven odds and seemingly all-powerful adversaries. But through strategy and sacrifice, even the sheep can dominate the wolves.
Could you hurry this along? I don't want him to find another buyer. Thank you.
Yes, captain.[ib:demure]
I swear homage to you as lawful {FACTION_TITLE}.
{ROMANTIC_REACTION} {ROMANTIC_DEFICIENCY}
Prodigal son of {CLAN_NAME}
My own people chased me from the village. It weren't true, what they said about me. Coveted my land, I'll warrant.
{SETTLEMENT_NAME}? This is a great honor, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}. I will protect it until the last drop of my blood.[rb:very_positive][rf:happy]
I am {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}, {FACTION_DESCRIPTION}. I have come here to warn people that the time when the Heavens tolerate injustice -- those times are coming to an end.
I'll be here, your {?PLAYER.GENDER}ladyship{?}lordship{\?}.
You have nothing on me. If you try to take me anywhere I'll kill you, and it will be in self-defense.[ib:aggressive]
Heaven help us. If I can't pay the rent, I'll end up on the side of the road with the landless, hoping for a day's work.[rf:confused_annoyed]
You have reached the maximum amount of workshops you can have.
I am currently working as {COMPANION_JOB}.
some men might fancy a game of dice. Figure Lady Luck wants to give them a kiss. We're here to keep things honest.
I'm not interested.

I have no doubt that {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} will have to accept the offer after seeing the boy with that many armed men behind him. Thank you, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}, for helping to ending this without more blood.

A decent {?NOTABLE.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?}, {NOTABLE.FIRSTNAME} is, as rich folk go. Always keeps a bit of grain to help out any of those who ate their seed over the winter. Knows the worth of a good name, {?NOTABLE.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} does.
Have you been able to talk with my boy yet?
Really boss, if I sell everything, and with all the money we have on hand, you can get {PRICE}{GOLD_ICON}. But I don't know anybody who can afford this right now.
Very good, then. Be on your way.
There is no practice fight because of the Tournament.
Never mind.
I am {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}, {FACTION_DESCRIPTION}. I have come here to share some fragments of the wisdom of the {DIVINITY} that I have been blessed with understanding.
I'd rather do something else
Well well. Who did you bring to see us? Did he bring his funeral shroud with him? I hope so. He's not leaving here alive.
Maybe, but that is your duty to your family.
Good. Let's see if we can work out fair compensation for us protecting the roads.
Leave and meet {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} later
We are doomed I say, doomed. A ruler who cannot control {?RULER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} passions brings ruin on the realm.
My name is {PLAYER.NAME}, {?CONVERSATION_NPC.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. May I ask your name?
{FIGHT_DEBRIEF} Do you want to give it another go?
Now, leave peacefully...

{GAME_NAME} is a game of incredibly uneven odds. A weakened and trapped king must try to escape from a horde of attackers who assault from every direction. Ironic how we, the once all-powerful {CULTURE_NAME}, have now fallen in the same position.
{NOTABLE.LINK} says we must trust in the wisdom of the authorities, so long as they follow the laws of the Heavens.
I have no task to offer you right now.
Wait here. We'll see if {?ALLEY_BOSS.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} wants to talk to you. (NOT IMPLEMENTED)
There's bandits lurking just beyond the walls these days. What about the taxes we pay, I ask you? Why aren't {?OWNER.GENDER}Lady{?}Lord{\?} {OWNER.LINK}'s men doing their jobs?
Right now I'm between jobs, so if you've got any work for me, I'm willing to discuss it.
Do you think this one will be faithful to you over many years? I know a rogue when I see one.
This action costs {NEEDED_GOLD_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{GOLD_ICON} and {NEEDED_INFLUENCE_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{INFLUENCE_ICON}. You will also be granting {SETTLEMENT} to {COMPANION.NAME}.
I am {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}. I'm a craftsman, a working man. A lot of the other honest men here in {TOWN_NAME}, the ones that work with their hands, they like me to speak for them.
You have yet to show yourself a competent leader of men, {PLAYER.NAME}. Prove yourself against my enemies, and I would be glad to have you as a vassal and entrust you with a fief of your own.
You best talk to the boss.
Well, I am still a novice in this game, but I learned a lot from playing with you.
Leave now and never come back! If we ever see you here we will kill you.
You! You've cut quite a swathe through my men there, damn you. How about we settle this, one-on-one?
a messenger from the ancestors
You lost your horse.
I am ready.
I hope your people are careful about how they proceed. It would be a pity if that spy got away.
The rules of the tournament are standard across Calradia, even outside the Empire. We match the fighters up by drawing lots. Sometimes you're part of a team, and sometimes you fight by yourself.
With the help of your scouting skill, you were able to trace their tracks.
If you let this boy go, his family will remember you did them a favor. That's a better deal for you than a fight you can't hope to win.
As you wish. Will I take some troops with me?
So long as the denars keep flowing, so will the blood of your enemies.

The way {NOTABLE.FIRSTNAME} helps out {?NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} good-for-nothing relatives, {?NOTABLE.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} won't have any seed grain for the next sewing -- and I, for one, will laugh.
Yes, your highness.
My name is {PLAYER.NAME}.
Nothing, nothing. Go on your way.
I should be on my way.
Make peace when I have you at an advantage? I think not.
The demons come at night and taunt me until dawn. What am I to do?
Don't be a stranger, eh? Come see me again some time.
I will not abandon my love, {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}sir{\?}!
Hmm... I keep pretty busy with my own trade. I haven't heard anything like that.
I'm hunting a spy. And now I have found him.
After your attack on the rival gang’s alley, {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} decided to change {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} plans, and doesn’t need your assistance anymore. Quest is canceled.
{CULPRIT.LINK} died. You failed to protect {CULPRIT.LINK} as you have promised {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is furious.
The powers of Heaven and of the Earth have entrusted to you the guardianship of this sacred land...
Your call.
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is waiting for you at {SETTLEMENT}.
Very well... You know where to find me.

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, a landowner from {QUEST_SETTLEMENT}, told you about an incident that is about to turn into an ugly feud. One young man killed another in an quarrel and the victim's family refused blood money compensation, demanding vengeance instead.
Come {DAUGHTER_NAME.NAME}, let's go before other hounds sniff our trail... I mean... No offense {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}.
I can use someone like you in my company.
I married bad. That was my misfortune. Drinks his wages and beats me when I say a word, so now I must beg for bread for our children.
No thank you. Good day to you.
I want you to patrol the area.
Hard. Don't hold back or you'll regret it.
A problem occured while trying to load the saved game.
I'm interested. Please tell me more.
I'll keep you in mind
Actually, I have other things to do.
Beg pardon, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}, I need to get back to my parents. Is there anything you need?
You will regret this!
Actually I do not have a free companion right now.

Who are you? Are you one of the bounty hunters sent by {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} to track us? Like we're animals or something? Look friend, we have done nothing wrong. As you may figured out already, this woman and I, we love each other. I didn't force her to do anything.[ib:closed]
They say that {OWNER.LINK} is an honest {?OWNER.GENDER}woman{?}man{\?}. But even {?OWNER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} can't stop all the thieving and corruption around here.
What do you want?
Thank you for saving me, sir. I won't forget what you did here today.
I want to join your army.
Just checking on you.
I would like to buy this workshop.
Thank the heavens we have {?NOTABLE.GENDER}women{?}men{\?} like {NOTABLE.LINK} to help the poor in these hard times.
Get out of my face, you vile beggar.[if:convo_angry]
Excuse me, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}, but I must shortly go about my business. Is there anything you need?
Sure. I'm happy to turn paper into silver... 1000 denars it is.
It is enough to say that I am looking for a new employer, and I will serve loyally so long as I am treated well and paid well.
Can I change the amount we're betting?
Yes... Please go on.
{QUEST_GIVER.NAME}'s Kidnapped Daughter at {SETTLEMENT}
Forgive me, {LORD.LINK}, I must give the matter more thought first...
Let me try and convince you. (Persuasion)
Anything else? Because unless you've got business here, maybe you'd best move along.[ib:closed][ib:normal]

Duties... There are only a few, none of them difficult. The very first thing is to declare your allegiance. An oath of loyalty to our cause. Once that's done, you shall be required to fulfill certain responsibilities. You'll participate in military campaigns, fulfill any duties given to you by your commanders, and most of all you shall attack the enemies of our kingdom wherever you might find them.
Well, there's one starting up at {CLOSEST_TOURNAMENT}, then another at {NEXT_CLOSEST_TOURNAMENT}. You should probably be able to get to either of those, if you move quickly.[ib:hip]
You know we are at war. Surrender or die.

I said to that good-for-nothing... I said to him, 'You leave my daughter alone, or {NOTABLE.LINK} will hear about it.' Hah! I don't see him tomcatting around outside my home any more, that's for sure.
The townsfolk told you that the spy is not bald.
Just so you know... I'm not cheap. I want {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} as an advance, or there's no deal.[ib:warrior]
I'm afraid I have to consider you my enemy.
As you wish, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}.
On second though I don't want to open a workshop now.
I swear that you are my {?LORD.GENDER}khatun{?}khan{\?}, my {?LORD.GENDER}mother{?}father{\?}, my protector...
As you wish.
Careful around here, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}. Don't want to get your hands caught in one of the presses. How can I help you?
we look after the honest folk here. Make sure no one smashes up their shops. And if they want to give us a coin or two as a way of saying thanks, well, who'd mind?
I no longer have need of your services.
Enough! That is enough. We will take the blood money, and make an end of this.
They know me as {PLAYER.NAME}. Mark it down, you shall be hearing of me a lot.
Gather all my companions in the settlement and find me.
I will send {NEEDED_MEN_COUNT} of my men with one of my lieutenants for {ALTERNATIVE_SOLUTION_DURATION} days to help you.
Run along now, child.
Finish this task before it is too late.
Very well, {PLAYER_SALUTATION}. Tell me what you have in mind.
I will be your loyal {?PLAYER.GENDER}follower{?}man{\?} as long as my breath remains...
Actually, never mind.
Thank you for your help. I am still very worried about my girl {TARGET_HERO.LINK}. Please find her and bring her back to me as soon as you can.
I cannot be sure of your loyalty any longer.
Indeed I am, {LORD_SALUTATION}. Forgive my rambling.
{?PLAYER.GENDER}Splendid{?}Good man{\?}! That's clever of you.[ib:normal]
Yes, I have.( {GOLD_COST} {GOLD_ICON})
Tell me who to command.
Many men have beards. Still, that is something.
Good journeys to you, {PLAYER.NAME}.
My wounds are still fresh. I need some time to recover.
It's a good place to hunt deer and boar
I still don't see why I should accept what you're asking of me.
Okay, just keep your eyes open.
Worry not {ISSUE_OWNER.NAME}, my men will be back with your deed in no time.
(Currently held by {COMPANION.LINK})
Very well. I'll get my gear and join you outside.
{KEY} Get Up
On second though I don't want to change what we are producing. Go on like this.
All right! I spare the boy's life. Now get out of my sight
I'll be wolves.
Keep safe, husband.
You cannot own a workshop in an enemy town.
We take raw materials and produce goods and sell them at the local market. After paying the wages we send profits the shop owner.
Farewell, my wife. Safe travels, and a swift return.
If you dare to even breathe against {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK}, it will be your last. You got it scum?
Thank you {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. You are a savior.
Yes, I know {HERO.LINK}.
I swear to heed your judgements according to the laws of the Aserai, and ensure that my kinfolk heed them as well...
Sounds fun.
All right then. I'll try that.
Your men are with my lads now. We will strike when the time is right. I will not forget this favor, I promise.
You are the shield of our people against the wolves of the forest, the steppe and the sea.
I'll be attackers.
Thanks. But I will give my bruises some time to heal.
Safe travels {?PLAYER.GENDER}milady{?}sir{\?}.
You are the chosen of the Sky, and I shall follow your banner as long as my breath remains...
I enjoyed our game. Let?s play again later.
Let us keep going.
my husband
Why should I negotiate for your gold, when I have enough men to simply take it?
Have a nice day, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}.

Only my noble vassals have the honour of carrying their own banners. However, after some time in mercenary service, you may earn the opportunity to swear homage to me and become my vassal, gaining the right to choose a banner of your own and fight under it in battle.
So we fight, then.[if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]
I’m glad someone’s on it. Just see that they do it quickly.
I want to speak with a prisoner (Cheat).
There's no doubt that {NOTABLE.FIRSTNAME} is a stiff-necked old goat, but you can't say {?NOTABLE.GENDER}she{?}he{\?}'s not honest as the day is long.
I understand. I'd take you prisoner too, if duty demanded. And I will soon, I hope.
I don't have any more questions.
I accept oaths only from those I can trust to keep them, {PLAYER.NAME}.

You need {NEEDED_GOLD_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{GOLD_ICON}, {NEEDED_INFLUENCE_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{INFLUENCE_ICON}. You don't have {NEEDED_GOLD_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{GOLD_ICON} and {NEEDED_INFLUENCE_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{INFLUENCE_ICON}.
Module Mismatch
Yes, sister.[ib:demure]
No, not really.
You're going to pay me a lot then, {REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} to be exact. But at that price, I agree.

You have convinced {TARGET_HERO.LINK} to release {PRODIGAL_SON.LINK}. Soon after, {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}Lady{?}Lord{\?} {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} sends {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} best regards and a sum of {REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} as a reward.
Sorry, but we don't know you. We can't just let anyone in. (Not enough renown)
I am {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}, {FACTION_DESCRIPTION}.
You have chosen to side with the rival gang leader, {RIVAL_GANG_LEADER.LINK}. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} must be furious.
Ah. Very well. I don't mind testing your mettle.

Yeah. I have a problem all right. {?TARGET_NOTABLE.GENDER}Her{?}His{\?} name is {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK}. {?TARGET_NOTABLE.GENDER}Her{?}His{\?} people have been bothering shop owners under our protection, demanding money and making threats. Let me tell you something - those shop owners are my cows, and no one else gets to milk them. We're ready to teach these interlopers a lesson, but I could use some help.

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} a landowner from {QUEST_GIVER_SETTLEMENT}, told you about an incident that is about to turn into an ugly feud. One youth killed another in a quarrel and the victim's family refused blood money as compensation and wants blood.
There is nobody inside to receive you right now.
A new caravan is created for {HERO.NAME}.

Hmm. Has your oath become burdensome, {PLAYER.NAME}? It is unusual to request release from homage, but in respect of your fine service, I will not hold you if you truly wish to end it. Though you would be sorely missed.
I will not consider your offer. Honor obliges me to fight you.
Greetings, friend. If you came for the games, the big fights, I'm afraid you're out of luck. There won't be games, or a 'tournament' as they say nowadays, any time soon.
We have come to talk! Just listen to us please!
Yeah.. Word is that {._}{ITEM_NAME} sells well in {TOWN_NAME}. A profit of {PRICE_DIFF}{GOLD_ICON} a load, they say.
Business is good. Can't deny that. But prices are high and getting higher.
We're not holding anyone in here right now. There's no reason for you to go in.[ib:closed]
{BASIC_EVAL} {REPUTATION}
I want to talk about other things.
Act normal. Have any of the participants in the tournament come round, asking very odd questions?
Now the man in the market said, 'All this trouble and woe means the Heavens aren't pleased with the one on the throne.' 'That's treason talk!' I told him. Of course I did.
Not Enough Gold
There's good iron, bog iron they call it, that collects on dead logs and the like
Revenge will be taken. Save your breath for the fight...
We must attack before the rival gang hears about our plan. You'd better hurry up!
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} cancels your plans due to the siege of {SETTLEMENT}. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} has worse troubles than {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} quarrel with the rival gang.

You have convinced {CULPRIT.LINK} to go to {TARGET_SETTLEMENT} to face {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} to try to solve this issue peacefully. He agreed on the condition that you protect him from his victim's angry relatives.
All right. I accept

{ISSUE_GIVER.LINK}, the {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} of {QUEST_SETTLEMENT}, has told you about a spy that hides as a tournament attendee. You are asked to expose the spy and take care of him. You asked {COMPANION.LINK} to take {NEEDED_MEN_COUNT} of your best men to go and take care of it. They should report back to you in {ALTERNATIVE_SOLUTION_DURATION} days.
You need {RELATION} relation with {HERO.NAME}.
You can't hide in the shadows forever. I pledge on my honor to protect you if things turn ugly.
It is something I must do, {LORD_SALUTATION}.
Right. Cheers, then.
We are preparing for an attack but we need some time to gather our men. Meet me here in {SETTLEMENT_NAME} after 3 days and we'll strike them together.
When the heat's this bad, a fellow can build up quite a thirst.
As you are not a warrior, you are free to go.
{?PLAYER.GENDER}Madam{?}Sir{\?}, people gossip. Everyone around here knows you've been asking those questions. Your quarry is going to slip away if you don't move quickly.

We welcome valiant warriors into our people, {PLAYER.NAME}, but you must prove yourself. Take your sword to my enemies and make a name for yourself, and we will formally adopt you as one of us. You may be given lands to protect and can speak at our councils.
Please! Bring my daughter back.

I tilled the land of {CRUEL_LANDOWNER.NAME}, and paid my rent, and earned him a pretty penny. But the times changed, the prices changed, he took my tenancy from me and said he'd raise sheep there instead. Where was I to go? What I am to do?
I ask you because you are a trader here. Have you seen one of the warriors in the tournament walking around here, asking people a lot of suspicious questions?
Nothing to report, your ladyship.
The Spy Among Us

You have paid the debt that {PRODIGAL_SON.LINK} owes. True to his word {TARGET_HERO.LINK} releases the boy immediately. Soon after, {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}Lady{?}Lord{\?} {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} sends {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} best regards and a sum of {REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} as a reward.
All right then, {PLAYER.NAME}, I will accept this for your sake. But remember, you owe me for this.[if:convo_stern]
I am already currently escorting {ESCORTING_PARTY}. I cannot follow you until this task is complete.
{ISSUE_GIVER.LINK}'s daughter is missing. {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} is offering a substantial reward to find the young woman and bring her back safely.
It's springtime, my friend. The season of the winds. The season of madness. Now then, I believe I'll have another drink.
You need to learn more about the arena by talking with the arena master.
We meet on the battlefield, then.[if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]
No, my friend. I am on a hunt.

If you'd rather not go into the fray yourself, you can leave me one of your companions together with {TROOP_COUNT} or so good men. If they stuck around for {RETURN_DAYS} days or so, I'd count it a very big favor.
{GAME_NAME} is a game of anticipation. With no possibility of capturing, all your effort should be on reading your opponent and planning further ahead than him.

{GAME_NAME} is fast and harsh, as warfare should be. Capture as much as possible to keep your opponent weakened and demoralized. But behind this endless offense, there should always be a strong defense to punish any attempt from your opponent to regain control.
It's only normal that you have second thoughts. I will be right by your side if you change your mind my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}.[rb:positive][rb:unsure]
Then I will find and talk to {KING.LINK}.
Party has less men than 40% of it's party size limit.
{ISSUE_OWNER.NAME} wants you to beat the game host
I am thinking of a different location.
Safe travels to you, my lady. Спадзяюся ўбачыць вас ізноў хуткім часам.
I accept your duel.
Gather my troops here and have them rejoin my party.

Ah yes... It is a bit embarrassing to mention, but... Well, when I am in town, I often have a drink at the inn and perhaps play a round of {GAME_TYPE} or two. Normally I play for low stakes but let's just say that last time the wine went to my head, and I lost something I couldn't afford to lose.
That will only make this more fun. How much were you thinking?
{WORKSHOP_DESCRIPTION} Are you sure you want to open {.%}{.a}{WORKSHOP_TYPE}{.%}?
Yes, I would like to sell.
The foes of Vlandia came a-plundering. King Derthert summoned his men to the keep!{newline}They rode to his muster with their hooves a-thundering. But Derthert had already gone to sleep.
Have a nice day my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}.
Not much work to be done... Sewing and mending and what.
Ah! You almost had me! Maybe you just weren't paying attention. Care to put another 1000 denars on the table and have another go?
the service of {.^}{RULER_TITLE} {RULER.NAME}
So can I join?
I had hoped that perhaps things would not come to fighting, at least not today.[ib:closed]

I am hosting a tournament at {SELECTED_SETTLEMENT}, and am expecting contenders to partake from all over the realm. I have my reasons to believe one of the attending warriors is actually a spy, sent to gather information about its defenses.
Ah - I don't know of any right now. That's a bit unusual though. Must be the wars.[ib:closed]
Very well. When next we meet, I can't promise things will go so peacefully.
You have bought the deed from the game host. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}.{newline}"I knew I I was right with betting on you. Please accept these {GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} denars with my gratitude."

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} told you that he lost a land deed while playing games in a tavern in {TARGET_SETTLEMENT}. He wants you to go find the game host and win it back for him. You told him that you will take care of the situation yourself.
You may have a point. I hereby revoke my previous decision.
Reward Troops
Yes? Go already. Get our boy back.
Heard that {NOTABLE.LINK} is making money hand over fist from {?NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} {.%}{SHOP_TYPE}{.%}. A cunning one, {?NOTABLE.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} is.
Excellent, {PLAYER.NAME}, excellent. I have every confidence in you.[if:idle_happy]
Right... So, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}, how can I help you?

Yes, well, we do hire mercenaries... And some of them, I'll admit, are men of honor. Your reward will be {MERCENARY_AWARD}{GOLD_ICON} for every group of enemies you vanquish, or for an equivalent deed.
This winter... Kids are all coughing and wheezing. My old ma's been bed-bound for a month. Can't afford coals for the stove at night. Spring thaw can't come fast enough for me.
Let me inspect your troops.

I am sure that, as {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} of this district, you will not let these unlawful threats go unpunished. As the lord of the region, you can talk to {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} and force him to accept the blood money.
You won the duel but your opponent was innocent. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is disappointed.
What choice do I have you heartless bastard![if:convo_furious]
I am pleased to grant you the title of {CULTURE_SPECIFIC_TITLE} and the fiefdom of {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.. You richly deserve it.
So, what shall I do?
I guess the only way to free you from this pretty boy's spell is to kill him.
I wish to form a caravan in this town.
War is all about sacrifice. In {GAME_NAME} you must make sure that your opponent sacrifices more than you do. Every move can expose you or your opponent and must be carefully considered.
You are already oath-bound to serve {FACTION_NAME}, are you not?
Farewell, my lady. I shall remain your most ardent admirer.
Tournament is over.

Thank you, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}. I have often thought about that. If I had a fief, with revenues, and perhaps a title to go with it, I could marry well and pass my wealth down to my heirs, and of course raise troops to help defend the realm.
Well there was one handsome warrior. Maybe younger than the others. Didn't have all the scars and whatnot that some of these hard cases pick up in their battles.
Would you like to play another round of {GAME_NAME}?
I give you my word and bond, to stand by your banner in battle so long as my breath remains...
{RIVAL_GANG_LEADER}'s Party
The gang starts to come at you, but slowly, so you still have time to back off. Do you wish to stand and confront them?
Heaven watch over us. Heaven give us strength.
we help out those who are down on their luck. Give 'em a purse of silver to tide them by. With a bit of speculative interest, naturally.
Match is over
I have no problem with the boy anymore, okay? Just leave me alone.
So, yeah... My {RANDOM_RELATIVE} says he took some {._}{PLURAL(ITEM_NAME)} to {TOWN_NAME} and made {PRICE_DIFF}{GOLD_ICON} in profit. Course he might be talking out of his arse.
Actually, I have changed my mind.
What kind of workshop do you want to open here?

{PLAYER.NAME}, you are a {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} without a master, holding lands in your name, with only the barest scrap of a claim to legitimacy. No king in Calradia would accept a lasting peace with you.
I wish to buy your {.%}{WORKSHOP_NAME}{.%}.
Relax. I've talked with your relative, {QUEST_GIVER.NAME}. I know all about your situation. I'm here to help.
Still haven't taken you to {HERO.LINK}...[ib:demure]
I will be on my way soon enough.
Of course. I'll pass on your orders. Anything else?
I don't fight duels with brigands.
I've changed my mind. You may go on your way.
I am thinking of a different person
Let's talk again soon, m'lady.
I would like to ask some questions.
Stop waiting
Wait! This lad is now under my protection. We have come to talk in peace..

Well, I could try and buy it from him, but I'm sure he'll jack up the price. I'd need to take along a few tough-looking bastards to show him the folly of not accepting a reasonable offer. One of your companions with {ALTERNATIVE_SOLUTION_NEEDED_MAN_COUNT} men would do the trick.
I'm looking for someone.
Hope there's enough hands for the harvest.
The grazing is worth a lot to those who own beasts
Engineer {CURRENTLY_HELD_ENGINEER}
Inn and Out
I shall stand by your side and not foresake you, and fight until my life leaves my body...

As the ruler, you have let {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK} to take {?TARGET_NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} kinsman's vengeance and failed to protect the boy as you have promised to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is furious.
I should be able to find her and see what's going on.
Round is over, you are qualified for the next stage of the tournament.
How do workshops work?
If you send your best tracker with a few men, I am sure they will find my girl and be back to you in no more than {ALTERNATIVE_SOLUTION_WAIT_DAYS} days.
It was good to meet you. Come see me if you need anything.
You need to get permission from the lord to talk to prisoners.
You failed to protect {CULPRIT.LINK} as you have promised {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is furious.
Rival Gang Moving In at {SETTLEMENT}
Very well. For now, go in peace.
Don't worry, I will protect your relative.
Well {PLAYER.NAME}, it is certainly good to see you still retain your sense of humor.[if:convo_nervous][rb:unsure]
Well {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}sir{\?}, sorry to disappoint you, but our people have some self-respect.
Please, do it for the sake of our friendship. (-{RELATION_DECREASE} to relation)
I care very little for your threats. My business is with {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK}.
This will be a massacre, not a duel, but I'm fine with that.
It's quite the opportunity to make your name. You risk no more than your teeth, and didn't the Heavens give us thirty of those, just to have a few spare for grand opportunities like this?
You have fought well. You are free to go.
You need to discuss this with our leader {LEADER.LINK}.
You don't deserve my coin. This contract is over.

{?PLAYER.GENDER}Madam{?}Sir{\?}, {TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK}'s nephew murdered one of my kinsman, and it is our right to take vengeance on the murderer. Custom gives us the right of vengeance. Everyone must know that we are willing to avenge our sons, or others will think little of killing them. Does it do us good to be a clan of old men and women, drowning in silver, if all our sons are slain? Please sir, allow us to take vengeance. We promise we won't let this turn into a senseless blood feud.
If you defend a murderer than you die like a murderer. Boys, kill them all!

Only noble vassals of {FACTION_LEADER} have the honour of carrying their own banners. However, after some time of mercenary service, perhaps you can earn the opportunity to swear homage to {FACTION_LEADER} and become his vassal, gaining the right to choose a banner of your own and fight under it in battle.
Good. Give us our due, and you can pass.
Hey boss, come to check on the business?
Many contenders have swords on their backs. Still this information might prove useful.
You need {NEEDED_GOLD_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{GOLD_ICON}, {NEEDED_INFLUENCE_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{INFLUENCE_ICON}. You don't have {NEEDED_GOLD_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{GOLD_ICON}.
Your attack on {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}’s gang has angered {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} and {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} broke off the agreement that you had.
You have defeated the rival gang and protected the interests of {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} in {SETTLEMENT}.
I'm here to deliver you my demands!
No. My word is final. You will have to take the blood money.
I affirm that you are executor of the will of the Senate and people...
Your clan is now at war with the {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}'s faction. Your agreement has been canceled.
{GANG_LEADER}'s gang has beaten you to the ground, but somehow you managed to cling to life.
I am enchanted to have met you, my lady.
Your clan is now at war with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}'s realm. Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is canceled.
Can't say I've seen anyone around here like that, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}.
There will be no peace between us and the {ENEMY_INFORMAL_NAME}, any more than the wolf makes peace with the sheep.
Hmm... Perhaps I will need to do more.
Who are you? What do you want from me?
I need you to craft a weapon for me
I've heard of these games...
I am sorry, I don't have that much money.
Thank you, {?CONVERSATION_NPC.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}. It was an honour to serve you..
.. and I shall defend your rights and the rights of your legitimate heirs.
I'm gathering an army. Summon the lords to rally to my banner. {AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}
Be on your way, then.
I will put in a word about you to {KING.LINK}.
I'll be defenders.
Not if it's a duel. I challenge you. No true tournament fighter would refuse.
There's nothing I need right now.
I'm still working on it.
My name is {PLAYER.NAME}, {?CONVERSATION_NPC.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. Tell me about yourself.

You asked the villagers around {CURRENT_SETTLEMENT} if they saw a young woman matching the description of {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}'s daughter, {TARGET_HERO.LINK}.{NEWLINE}{NEWLINE}They said a young woman and a young man dropped by early in the morning to buy some supplies and then rode off towards {TARGET_VILLAGE}.
These nobles aren't like you and me. They've kept their wealth by crushing people like you for generations. Don't mess with them.
Thank you, {?PLAYER.GENDER}my lady{?}sir{\?}.
I don't know where {?HERO.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} is.
Round is over, your team survived the final round of the tournament.
I must think carefully about this.
Let me think about this some more.

Good! We understand the spy is going to {TARGET_SETTLEMENT}. If they're trying to gather information, they'll be wandering around the market asking questions in the guise of making small talk. Just go around talking to the townsfolk, and you should be able to figure out who it is.
{TARGET_NOTABLE.LINK}'s village {TARGET_SETTLEMENT} was raided. Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is canceled.
Look all around you. People making money hand over fist, draped in silks, smelling of wine and perfume. But is it the honest folk? I think not.
Cuckoo bird, cuckoo bird, tell me no lies. 'I snuck into another bird's tree'.{newline}Cuckoo bird, cuckoo bird, say something wise. 'There's a king in Battania who's just like me.'
Let's just save ourselves some trouble, and I'll just pay you that amount.
What I want to say is... You don't need to be a part of this. I'll double whatever {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} is paying you if you join us.
I will have one of my trackers and {REQUIRED_TROOP_AMOUNT} of my men to find your daughter.
In exchange for your loyalty, I offer you the command of some of my best men. And in recognition of your worth, let me present you with this gift, which I hope will serve you well on the battlefield.
My sword is yours. For the right sum.
What else do you have to say?
Rival Gang Moving In At {SETTLEMENT}
I'm {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}. Ask around about me. You'll learn I'm someone you don't want to mess with.[if:convo_stern]
How much are the prizes in the tournaments?
{CULPRIT.LINK} is no longer a member of your clan. Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} was terminated.
My {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}, as much as I appreciate the gesture, I am not sure that you have a suitable estate to grant me.
Do think about it. But make sure you do not end up on the losing side.
Just passing through.
Your good health, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. May I help you?
I am at your mercy.[if:convo_beaten]

Yes... I've suffered a great misfortune. My daughter, a headstrong girl, has been bewitched by this never-do-well. I told her to stop seeing him but she wouldn't listen! Now she's missing - I'm sure she's been abducted by him! I'm offering a bounty of {BASE_REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} to anyone who brings her back. Please {?PLAYER.GENDER}ma'am{?}sir{\?}! Don't let a father's heart be broken.
Never mind then.
Now get lost...
We will not forget this.
{PLAYER.NAME}.. Is that you? Am I free?
As you wish. I hereby declare your oaths to be null and void. You will no longer hold land or titles in my name, and you are released from your duties to my house. You are free, {PLAYER.NAME}.
I'll have your head on a pike for this, you bastard! Someday![if:convo_furious][ib:agressive]
Let it be known that you are one of us. We shall defend your rights as you defend ours. You may be granted lands in our domains and the authority to judge disputes.
I want you to join my army. ({INFLUENCE_COST}{INFLUENCE_ICON})
Your word shall divide the spoils of victory and the bounties of peace.
You'll know right away once the preparations are complete. Just don't leave town.
I must beg my leave.
Nothing to report, your lordship.
Do what you must.

Only my loyal vassals can own lands and castles in my realm. A mercenary can not be trusted with such a responsibility. However, after serving for some time, you can swear homage to me and become my vassal. Then you will be rewarded with a fief.
You received a message from {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. "This may not have seemed like an important task, but I placed my trust in you. I guess I was wrong to do so."
Thank you, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}, thank you.

If you've got more mouths in your house than your land will feed, {NOTABLE.FIRSTNAME} will let you work a bit of {?NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} property - but he'll take a third of your harvest, even if you're kin.
I don't think I owe you such a favor {PLAYER.NAME}. I see no reason to accept this for you.[if:convo_stern]
I want to end our contract.
They say the merchant {NOTABLE.LINK} is hiring at {?NOTABLE.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} {.%}{SHOP_TYPE}{.%}. {?NOTABLE.GENDER}She{?}He{\?}'s a harsh master but a fair one, they say.
My hair is fine as it is, thank you.
My dear {PLAYER.NAME}, your generous gift has led me to reconsider what you ask, and I have come to appreciate the wisdom of your proposal.
Barter line - player should not see this
I am looking for a spy. Have you seen any warriors in the tournament wandering about, asking too many suspicious questions?
Really boss, if I sell everything, and with all the money we have on hand, you can get {PRICE}{GOLD_ICON}. You sure you want to sell?
I did what I had to do. Pack up, you need to go.
What do you want, you degenerate?[if:convo_stern]

I told that silly {RANDOM_RELATIVE} of mine. I told him. I said, 'You take money from {NOTABLE.LINK}, {?NOTABLE.GENDER}she{?}he{\?}'ll want back double. And if you value the bones in your hands, you'll pay.' I told him, I did.
I don't have any other jobs for you right now.
I have no wish to fight you.[ib:closed][if:idle_angry]
I see your wager. Let's play.

You want some mercenary work, eh? Well, we are glad to take fighters, whether they seek glory or gold. If you fight for us, you will receive {MERCENARY_AWARD}{GOLD_ICON} whenever you defeat a party of enemies, or for any other significant deed.
Of course, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. Go in.
You bastard![ib:aggressive][if:convo_furious]
This sounds pretty serious. Go on.
Anything else I can do for you?
Having a look. Do you mind?
{LEADER.LINK}, {LIEGE}
Sure, boss go ahead.
I'll need you to lead a party.
I swear by my ancestors that you are lawful {FACTION_TITLE}.

Valiant warriors have always been welcomed as citizens of the Empire and granted lands, titles and honors, {PLAYER.NAME}, but you have yet to prove yourself. Take your sword to my enemies and we may speak of this later.
You're of the {FACTION}, right? That means you're my prisoner.
No thanks are necessary.
Thank you, good {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}sire{\?}. I never forget someone who's done me a good turn.[if:convo_calm_friendly]
Great Khan Monchug lifts his hand. We all hark to his command!{newline}Great Khan Monchug rides away. We go back to nap and play.
Direction of daughter and rogue
As it happens, {PLAYER.NAME}, I promised {FACTION_LEADER} that I would hire a company of mercenaries for an upcoming campaign.
You lost the board game and failed to help {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. "Thank you for trying, {PLAYER.NAME}, but I guess I chose the wrong person for the job."
Lads! Do you hear me? Take them down!
{SETTLEMENT} was raided, Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is canceled.
Thank you and good day my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}.
You received a message from {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. "Thank you for killing the spy. Please accept these {REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} denars with our gratitude."

I lost a mule loaded with wares when it slid into the river, and {HARSH_MERCHANT.NAME} said he'd take it from my wages for the next year, didn't care if I starved. If I didn't like it then I could go beg on the street, he said to me. So look at me. I stood up to him and look at me now.
Very well. Do come back when you're ready, {?PLAYER.GENDER}my lady{?}my lord{\?}.
Now that's an unpleasant set of options. How about we just go our separate ways?[ib:closed]
Any news? Have you managed to find him yet?
What exactly is {GAME_NAME}?

{ISSUE_GIVER.LINK}, a gang leader from {SETTLEMENT}, has told you about a new gang that is trying to get a hold on the town. You asked {COMPANION.LINK} to take {TROOP_COUNT} of your best men to stay with {ISSUE_GIVER.LINK} and help {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} in the coming gang war. They should return to you in {RETURN_DAYS} days.
What's your story again?
What would it take for you to go your way, and for me to go my way?
I need you to follow me for a while.

Your {?PLAYER.GENDER}ladyship{?}lordship{\?}... This is quite the honor. Do you play {GAME_NAME}? It's the traditional pastime of the {CULTURE_NAME}, and I am reckoned a master. If you wish to play a game, please, take a seat and we'll start.
You are wounded
Actually, I have other things to do. Maybe later.
Very well. You may consider yourself under the protection of the {FACTION_NAME}. You have until this time tomorrow to complete your journey, or we may ask for another payment from you.
It seems the village has been raided a short while ago. You found nothing but smoke, fire and crying people.
I thank you my {?CONVERSATION_NPC.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}.
What are you planning to do?
Some day you may wish to save the life of one of your sons through blood money. If you refuse mercy, mercy may be refused you.
You don't have {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON}.
Good, I'll have my men write up a simple contract. On behalf of the {KINGDOM_FORMAL_NAME}, I welcome you. May you put your sword to good use against our enemies.
Time has taken its toll on us all, friend. It's time that you retire.
As far as I know, we have no contract to fight you.
This a {.%}{WORKSHOP_TYPE}{.%}, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}.
Think nothing of it. I'm glad you're safe.
Very well. Expect no mercy.[if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]
You could say perhaps that I am between jobs right now, so if by any chance you are looking to hire... Well, I'm open to discussion.
Well. Let me put things this way...
Ok then. I will call my men to help you form a caravan. I hope it brings you a good profit.
I would like to sell this workshop.
I'm still gathering my men for the fight. I'll send a runner for you when the time comes.
How much are the prizes in the practice fights?

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, a lord from the {QUEST_GIVER_CLAN} clan, asked you to free {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} relative. The young man is currently held by {TARGET_HERO.LINK} a local gang leader because of his debts. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}Lady{?}Lord{\?} {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has given you enough gold to settle {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} debts but {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} encourages you to keep the money to yourself and make an example of these criminals so no one would dare to hold a nobleman again. You have sent {COMPANION.LINK} and {NEEDED_MEN_COUNT} men to take care of the situation for you. They should be back in {ALTERNATIVE_SOLUTION_DURATION} days.
Then you will pay with blood!
Don't attack! We surrender.
I'm {CONVERSATION_HERO.FIRSTNAME}. Ask around about me. Let's just say I've got a talent for solving people's problems, so to speak.[if:convo_bemused]

I’m not inclined to pay the debt. I’m not going to reward this kind of lawlessness, when even the best families aren’t safe. I’ve sent word to the lord of {SETTLEMENT_NAME} but I can’t say I expect to hear back, what with the wars and all. I want someone to go there and free the lad. You could pay, I suppose, but I’d prefer it if you taught those bastards a lesson. I’ll pay you either way but obviously you get to keep more if you use force.
A face without scars and markings is usual for farmers and merchants but less so for warriors. This might be useful.
Very well... You may go.
I am ready to pay my debt.
Yes, have you made any progress on it?
I'm not yielding, so let's go to it, then.[if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]
All those bastards walking around drunk and bothering folks.. But they work for {NOTABLE.LINK} and you can't say a thing if you value your head.
Sitting in the marketplace all day one learns many things if one keeps one's ears open... But alas, I have heard nothing recently that might interest your worshipful self.
Farewell, {PLAYER.NAME}. I regret that we part on these terms.
No, no. I know a trap when I see one. You win. Good-bye.
Farewell then, {PLAYER.NAME}, and good luck go with you.
Ah! Now that was as good a fight as any I've had. Here, take this purse, you deserve it.
But I've promised to find you and return you to your {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}mother{?}father{\?}. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} would be devastated.
So be it. You may ply your wit on the carrion-fowl.[if:idle_angry][ib:warrior]
Spare us from {?OWNER.GENDER}ladies{?}lords{\?} like {OWNER.LINK}, whose hearts are too tender to punish the thieves and rogues who terrorize honest folk.
your service
I accept these conditions and I am ready to pay {AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} to create a caravan.
Family Feud
I'll go right away.
You need {NEEDED_GOLD_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{GOLD_ICON}, {NEEDED_INFLUENCE_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{INFLUENCE_ICON}. You don't have {NEEDED_INFLUENCE_TO_GRANT_FIEF}{INFLUENCE_ICON}.

{ISSUE_GIVER.LINK}, a landowner from {ISSUE_GIVER_SETTLEMENT}, told you about an incident that is about to turn into an ugly feud. One youth killed another in an accident and the victim's family refused blood money, indicating that they want revenge. You decided to leave {COMPANION.LINK} with some man for {RETURN_DAYS} days to let things cool down. They should return with the reward of {REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} denars as promised by {ISSUE_GIVER.LINK} after {RETURN_DAYS} days.
Go on. I'm ready for more.
Yes, it's fine.

Say what you will about {?OWNER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?} {OWNER.LINK}... {?OWNER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?}'ll give the lowest wretch in the realm a fair hearing in {?OWNER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} court. Can't deny that.
Well then, we have a deal. I will instruct my workers that they are now working for you. Good luck!
Practice Fight
My husband was wounded in the wars, and now can't pull a plow. So he lost his tenancy, and now I must beg in the marketplace.
It's a lean autumn, this one. Heaven help us lay in enough wood before the winter.
Good day, friend. You look like you know your way around an arena. How can I help you?
We will meet again.
